column2: "[Arrived] [too late]"

"That voice... It sounds like it's coming from
inside my head."

"I guess that proves you speak our language.
As long as we're head-chatting, can I ask you
a few questions?"

"[No] [Leave immediately]
[Nothing to say] [to ARKS]"

"If you're upset about what happened, I
apologize for having to fight your kind."

"But you're more than smart enough to know the current situation is broken.
Action is needed."

"A sane dragorii like you would never blindly attack
a stranger without cause, yet we've run a gauntlet."

"[Then] [you gave them] [cause]
[Enough] [idle chatter]
[Leave immediately]"
"Just listen!"

"I know, <%me>.
You don't have to say it."

"This is as far as we're getting today. Let's head
back for now."
"You can now invite Aki and Wright to join you as partners."
"〔遅かったか〕"

"頭の中に響くような声……
キミは、私たちの言葉を解する
龍族か……"

"わざわざコンタクトを取ってくれた
ということは、私の話も
聞いてもらえるのかな？"

"〔断る〕〔早々に去れアークス〕
〔貴様達と〕〔交わす言葉はない〕"

"……キミの同族と
戦わねばならなかった事は謝罪する。"

"だが、それほどの知性があるのなら
キミも気付いているはずだ
この状況のおかしさに。"

"キミのように、正常な状態の龍族ならば
無警告で襲いかかってきたりはしない。
そうだろう？"

"〔……くだらん言葉遊びに〕
〔付き合うつもりはない〕"

"……ああ
<%me>くん。"

"わかっているとも、ここが限度だ。
キミの言うとおりだ、戻ろう。"

"
アキとライトをパートナーとして呼べるようになりました。
"
"The Proud Children of Fire"
"Chapter 4: The Dragorii Disease"
"Proud scales of Amduscia"
"第４章 龍の病"
